## Setup

Run these commands one time in the console:

```
install.packages("keras")
keras::install_keras()
```

When it asks if you want to install Miniconda type `Y` and then hit `Enter`.

This is installing the tools we need to fit Neural Networks (using Python behind the scenes)

## Packages

```{r}
library(ISLR)
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(keras)
```
